Page._content:
name: Sync

on:
  push:
    branches: [ master ]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - name: Sync to Gitee
      uses: wearerequired/git-mirror-action@master
      env:
          #  Settings->Secrets  GITEE_RSA_PRIVATE_KEY
          SSH_PRIVATE_KEY: ${{ secrets.GITEE_RSA_PRIVATE_KEY }}
      with:
          #  GitHub 
          source-repo: "git@github.com:NoJsJa/blogs.git"
          #  Gitee 
          destination-repo: "git@gitee.com:nojsjaOSC/blogs.git"

    - name: Build Gitee Pages
      uses: yanglbme/gitee-pages-action@master
      with:
          #  Gitee 
          gitee-username: nojsjaOSC
          #  Settings->Secrets  GITEE_PASSWORD
          gitee-password: ${{ secrets.GITEE_PASSWORD }}
          #  Gitee 
          gitee-repo: nojsjaOSC/blogs

name: Sync

on:
  push:
    branches: [ master ]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - name: Sync to Gitee
      uses: wearerequired/git-mirror-action@master
      env:
          #  Settings->Secrets  GITEE_RSA_PRIVATE_KEY
          SSH_PRIVATE_KEY: ${{ secrets.GITEE_RSA_PRIVATE_KEY }}
      with:
          #  GitHub 
          source-repo: "git@github.com:NoJsJa/blogs.git"
          #  Gitee 
          destination-repo: "git@gitee.com:nojsjaOSC/blogs.git"

    - name: Build Gitee Pages
      uses: yanglbme/gitee-pages-action@master
      with:
          #  Gitee 
          gitee-username: nojsjaOSC
          #  Settings->Secrets  GITEE_PASSWORD
          gitee-password: ${{ secrets.GITEE_PASSWORD }}
          #  Gitee 
          gitee-repo: nojsjaOSC/blogs

### docker

> 
> Docker Engine-Community  Ubuntu 
> 
> -   Xenial 16.04 (LTS)
> -   Bionic 18.04 (LTS)
> -   Cosmic 18.10
> -   Disco 19.04
> -   
> 
> Docker Engine - Community  x86_64 amd64armhfarm64s390x IBM Z ppc64leIBMPower
> 
> * * *
> 
> #### 
> 
> Docker  dockerdocker.io  docker-engine 
> 
`$ sudo apt-get remove docker docker-engine docker.io containerd runc`
> 
>  Docker Engine-Community  docker-ce 
> 
>  Docker Engine-Community
> 
> * * *
> 
> ####  Docker 
> 
>  Docker Engine-Community  Docker  Docker 
> 
> #### 
> 
>  apt 
> 
`$ sudo apt-get update`
> 
>  apt HTTPS:
> 
`$ sudo apt-get install apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl gnupg-agent software-properties-common`
> 
>  Docker  GPG 
> 
`$ curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add -`
> 
> 9DC8 5822 9FC7 DD38 854A E2D8 8D81 803C 0EBF CD88 8
> 
`$ sudo apt-key fingerprint 0EBFCD88`
>    
> pub  rsa4096 2017-02-22 \[SCEA\]  
>    9DC8 5822 9FC7 DD38 854A E2D8 8D81 803C 0EBF CD88  
> uid      \[ unknown\] Docker Release (CE deb) <docker@docker.com>  
> sub  rsa4096 2017-02-22 \[S\]  
> 
> 
> 
`$ sudo add-apt-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ ubuntu $(lsb_release -cs) stable"`
> 
> ####  Docker Engine-Community
> 
>  apt 
> 
`$ sudo apt-get update`
> 
>  Docker Engine-Community  containerd 
> 
`$ sudo apt-get install docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io`
> 
>  Docker Engine-Community
> 
`$ apt-cache madison docker-ce `
>   
>  docker-ce | 5:18.09.1~3-0~ubuntu-xenial | https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu xenial/stable amd64 Packages  
>  docker-ce | 5:18.09.0~3-0~ubuntu-xenial | https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu xenial/stable amd64 Packages  
>  docker-ce | 18.06.1~ce~3-0~ubuntu    | https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu xenial/stable amd64 Packages  
>  docker-ce | 18.06.0~ce~3-0~ubuntu    | https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu xenial/stable amd64 Packages  
>  ...  
> 
>  5:18.09.1~3-0~ubuntu-xenial
> 
`$ sudo apt-get install docker-ce=<VERSION_STRING> docker-ce-cli=<VERSION_STRING> containerd.io`
> 
>  Docker :
> 
`$ sudo docker run hello-world`
> ####  docker-compose
`$ sudo apt install docker-compose`
> #### docker
`$ sudo gedit /etc/docker/daemon.json`
>
> 
> ```
>  {
>    "registry-mirrors": ["https://docker.mirrors.ustc.edu.cn"]
>  }
> ```
>

### 
* Tim => `sudo docker pull bestwu/qq`
* wechat => `sudo docker pull bestwu/wechat`

### 
1. audioID  
`getent group audio | cut -d: -f3`
2.   
yml docker-tim.yml
```yml
version: '2'
services:
 qq:
   image: bestwu/qq:office    #  office  latest  QQTim
   container_name: qq
   devices:
     - /dev/snd #
   volumes:
     - /tmp/.X11-unix:/tmp/.X11-unix
     - $HOME/TencentFiles:/TencentFiles
   environment:
     - DISPLAY=unix$DISPLAY
     - XMODIFIERS=@im=ibus #
     - QT_IM_MODULE=ibus
     - GTK_IM_MODULE=ibus
     - AUDIO_GID=29 #  (29 parrotsec) audio gid 
     - GID=1000 #  1000  gid 
     - UID=1000 #  1000  uid 
```

3.   
start-tim.sh
```yml
#!/bin/sh
# 
# -d 
echo "yw020154" | sudo docker-compose -f docker-tim.yml up -d
```

4. 
```sh
# //
sudo docker start/stop/restart qq
# 
sudo docker kill qq
# 
sudo docker ps
```

Post.title: proxychains
Post.subtitle: proxy linux
Post._content:
### proxychains  

`sudo apt install proxychains`

### proxychains  

`vim /etc/proxychains.conf`

### socks4 127.0.0.1 9095  

`socks5 127.0.0.1 1080`

ps: socks4 127.0.0.1 9095torsocks5 127.0.0.1 1080shadowsocksproxychains.conf,,  

```bash
ProxyList format
 94 #       type  ip  port  [user pass]
 95 #       (values separated by 'tab' or 'blank')
 96 #
 97 #       only numeric ipv4 addresses are valid
 98 #
 99 #
100 #        Examples:
101 #
102 #       socks5  192.168.67.78   1080    lamer   secret
103 #       http    192.168.89.3    8080    justu   hidden
104 #       socks4  192.168.1.49    1080
105 #       http    192.168.39.93   8080
```

###   
 proxychains 
```bash
proxychains wget http://xxx.com/xxx.zip
proxychains git clone https://xxxxxxxxx.git
```
npmhttp
```bash
# 8002
npm config set proxy http://127.0.0.1:1081
npm config set https-proxy http://127.0.0.1:1081

# 
npm config set proxy http://username:password@127.0.0.1:1081
npm confit set https-proxy http://username:password@127.0.0.1:1081
```
npmsocks5
```bash
# socks51081
# 
npm install -g http-proxy-to-socks
# 8002,http8002httpsocks1081
hpts -s 127.0.0.1:1081 -p 8002
# npm8080
npm config set proxy http://127.0.0.1:8002
npm config set https-proxy http://127.0.0.1:8002
```


```bash
npm config get
  or
npm config list

npm config delete proxy
  and
npm config delete https-proxy
```

Post.title: poliposhadowsocks
Post.subtitle: shadowsocks polipo
Post._content:
linuxshadowsocksss`socks5``http``https`sspolipoweb

#### shadowsocks[](http://keliu.me/2018/12/08/ss/#%E5%AE%89%E8%A3%85shadowsocks)

pipss

```
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install python-pip
sudo apt-get install python-setuptools m2crypto

pip install shadowsocks
```

#### shadowsocks[](http://keliu.me/2018/12/08/ss/#%E5%90%AF%E5%8A%A8shadowsocks)

`sslocal`shadowsocks

`/etc``shadowsocks.json`

```
vi /etc/shadowsocks.json
```

ss

```
{
    "server":"11.22.33.44",
    "server_port":6666,
    "local_port":1080,
    "password":"123456",
    "timeout":300,
    "method":"aes-256-cfb"
}
```

ss

```
sslocal -c /etc/shadowsocks.json
```



#### polipo[](http://keliu.me/2018/12/08/ss/#%E5%AE%89%E8%A3%85%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AEpolipo)



```
sudo apt-get install polipo
```

polio`/etc/polipo/config`

```
# This file only needs to list configuration variables that deviate
# from the default values.  See /usr/share/doc/polipo/examples/config.sample
# and "polipo -v" for variables you can tweak and further information.

logSyslog = true
logFile = /var/log/polipo/polipo.log

proxyAddress = "0.0.0.0"

socksParentProxy = "127.0.0.1:1080"
socksProxyType = socks5
proxyPort = 8123

chunkHighMark = 50331648
objectHighMark = 16384

serverMaxSlots = 64
serverSlots = 16
serverSlots1 = 32
```

polipo

```
/etc/init.d/polipo restart
```

#### [](http://keliu.me/2018/12/08/ss/#%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E4%BB%A3%E7%90%86)

polipo 8123********

```
export http_proxy=http://127.0.0.1:8123
```



```
curl www.google.com
```

****

```
unset http_proxy
```

****` export http_proxy=http://127.0.0.1:8123`` ~/.bashrc``source ~/.bashrc`
